metadata.title: GoalCraftAI - Transform your goals into an epic adventure
metadata.description: Personal goal gamification platform with AI. Create structured paths, unlock milestones and achieve your dreams like in a video game.

home.title: GoalCraftAI - Transform your goals into an epic adventure with GPT-4 AI
home.description: Revolutionary goal gamification platform. Create personalized paths with AI, earn XP, unlock achievements. Start for free.
home.h1: GoalCraftAI - Goal Gamification Platform with GPT-4 Artificial Intelligence
home.intro: GoalCraftAI is a revolutionary platform that uses GPT-4 artificial intelligence to transform your personal and professional goals into gamified paths. Create skill trees, unlock stages, earn XP and achieve your goals in a fun and motivating way.
features: GPT-4 AI for personalized path generation
Complete gamification system with XP and levels

faq.question: How does GoalCraftAI work?
faq.answer: You describe your goal to our GPT-4 AI which automatically generates a personalized path with stages to unlock progressively.

faq.question: Is it free?
faq.answer: Yes, you can create up to 3 goals for free. Premium plan offers unlimited goals and GPT-4 access.

testimonial.author: Mary L., London
testimonial.text: GoalCraftAI transformed how I approach my goals. I learned Python in 3 months thanks to the gamified path!

pricing.title: Pricing - GoalCraftAI
pricing.description: Free plan or Premium from â‚¬7.49/month. Unlimited GPT-4 AI, personalized coaching and unlimited goals. Free trial available.
pricing.intro: Transform your goals into reality with our gamified platform. Start free or go Premium to unlock full potential.

faq.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faq.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription anytime from your profile. No commitment.

faq.question: How does the free trial work?
faq.answer: You have access to 3 free goals with no time limit. Upgrade to Premium when you want more.

faq.question: What's the difference between GPT-3.5 and GPT-4?
faq.answer: GPT-4 is smarter, more creative and accurate. It generates more detailed and personalized paths.

testimonial.author: Mary, 28 years old
testimonial.text: The AI helped me structure my goals like never before. I learned guitar in 3 months!
